snippet: “Enlightened,” HBO’s acclaimed comedy of sorts about a would-be activist played by Laura Dern, returns on Sunday even as other cult series fall by the wayside.
abstract: HBO's acclaimed but low-rated comedy series Enlightened, featuring would-be activist played by Laura Dern, returns for second season even as network cancels other cult series with small audiences.
lead_paragraph: “Enlightened,” HBO’s acclaimed comedy of sorts about a would-be activist played by Laura Dern, returns on Sunday even as other cult series fall by the wayside.

headline.seo: HBO Gives Low-Rated ‘Enlightened’ a Second Shot
headline.main: A Low-Rated Show Gets a Second Shot
headline.print_headline: A Low-Rated Show Gets a Second Shot
